column4: ive tried linux many times, i keep switching for games:D (also cuz i doent know jack all abt linux, not even how file system wrks...untill recently lol)

now i got 2hdds:D he he he
Install Windows first, then Linux.  I'm sure there's a way to edit the boot tables but I don't know that fancy crap.

Only if you screw it up all the time.
i got it sorted now:D 2 hdds is theway. to boot linux or windows i simply switch the hdd for it to look in first...and keep it single boot:) woks like a charm;)

doent know:D i got the linux virus:D no more lazy:D:D:D
